hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:There is a time on Friday at which no Muslim servant would pray and would ask Allah for a thing (that is good) but He would give it to him. Qutaiba pointed with the help of his hand that it (the time) is short

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي السَّاعَةِ الَّتِي فِي يَوْمِ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The (special) time that occurs on Friday
